node.title: Hamilton, Verstappen risk penalties at Brazilian Grand Prix
node.alt: A composite image of Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen in 2021
node.description: Formula 1 title rivals Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen both face possible sanctions after being accused of breaking the rules in São Paulo.
node.content:
["Formula 1\u00a0title rivals Lewis Hamilton and Max Verstappen both faced possible sanctions\u00a0after being accused of breaking the rules ahead of the Brazilian Grand Prix.", "On a day of drama in S\u00e3o Paulo\u00a0after qualifying for the sprint race that determines the starting grid, Mercedes driver Hamilton and then Red Bull's championship leader Verstappen caught the stewards' attention.", "Seven-time world champion Hamilton dominated qualifying at the Interlagos circuit but his car then failed a technical check, with the risk of demotion to the back of the sprint field.", "Stewards ordered the rear wing assembly to be impounded and the car stored overnight.", "A spokesman for\u00a0governing body FIA said the officials were awaiting further evidence that would not be available until the morning local time.", "A statement then delivered another bombshell by summoning Verstappen and a team representative to a meeting\u00a0for an alleged breach of the international sporting code.", "Video footage posted by a fan on social media showed Verstappen seemingly checking with his hands the rear wings of his Red Bull and Hamilton's Mercedes after they had parked up post-qualifying.", "Article 2.5.1 of the sporting code states that \"no operation, checking, tuning or repair is allowed\" in that secure area unless authorised by officials.", "", "
Lewis Hamilton set the fastest qualifying time, but can only start sixth at best in Sunday's race.(Getty Images: Lars Baron)
", "Hamilton \u2014 19 points adrift of Verstappen with four races remaining \u2014\u00a0already has a five-place grid penalty for Monday's race AEDT\u00a0after Mercedes changed the engine in his car.", "The Briton had clocked a fastest time of one minute and 07.934 seconds, with Verstappen 0.438 slower, a considerable margin around one of the shortest laps on the calendar.", "Three points are to be won in the sprint but Hamilton's chances of taking them were thrown into doubt by a measurement of millimetres.", "Formula One technical delegate Jo Bauer reported the uppermost rear wing adjustable positions did not comply with the rules for a maximum distance of 85 millimetres when the drag reduction system was deployed.", "Hamilton had earlier told reporters the car was finally performing to his liking.", "\"A lot of the times we get it wrong, I get it wrong, and today I got it right and the car was really nice to drive. It was everything I wanted,\" he said.", "", "
Hamilton was over four tenths of a second faster than Max Verstappen.(Getty Images: Buda Mendes)
", "Verstappen said Hamilton's new engine had clearly made a difference.", "\"For me it's not a big shock. I'm just happy to be second,\" he said.", "That's a good position to start from. Of course you always want to be closer but sometimes you just have to be realistic and there was not much more in it.\"", "The 100-kilometre sprint is the last of three in the experimental format this season, with the other two contested at Monza and Silverstone.", "Mercedes' Valtteri Bottas was third fastest, with Red Bull's Sergio Perez alongside on the second row.", "ABC/AP"]
